title: Adam
description: ‘If only we had known.If we had just been aware of the child,delivered to safety, his only fragile protection the dark keep him secret, or he will die.If we had recognised the flaw in humanity’sbalancing act, competing with Artificial Intelligences by merging man with technology.If we had understood that when we finallyconquered the light-speed barrier, our momentousachievement would be noticed.If only we had known, that something wasout there, watching, and waiting…’The Lament of Michael Foxton, 2221 AD
author: A.K.  Stone
